title: KI Puzzle 1000 Piece Puzzle for Adults Madalina Tantareanu Cities at Midnight: Prague Art Jigsaw Puzzle 27x20 KI Puzzles
descriptions:
Introducing the KI Puzzle 1000 Piece Puzzle for Adults, featuring the captivating artwork of Madalina Tantareanu. Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Prague at midnight with this stunning jigsaw puzzle.

With 1000 intricately designed pieces, this puzzle is recommended for adults who enjoy a challenge. The dimensions of the assembled puzzle are 27 inches in width and 20 inches in height, allowing you to appreciate the intricate details of the artwork.

The colorful artwork, created by Madalina Tantareanu, brings the city of Prague to life, making this puzzle not only a form of entertainment but also a work of art. Spend hours engrossed in the puzzle, enjoying the entertainment value it provides.

The puzzle is made from recycled paperboard, making it an eco-friendly choice. Additionally, the puzzle has a very low dust level, ensuring a clean and enjoyable puzzle-solving experience. The packaging consists of a sealed plastic bag, keeping all the puzzle pieces securely in one place.

Included with the puzzle is a poster image guide, serving as a helpful reference as you piece together the puzzle. The sealed puzzle pieces bag ensures that none of the pieces go missing.
